statements: UPDATE park_locations SET location='Central Park' WHERE park_id=1;
UPDATE park_locations SET acreage=150.25, park_name='Yellowstone National Park' WHERE park_id=2;
UPDATE park_locations SET park_name = 'Central Park', location = 'New York City' WHERE park_id = 1;
UPDATE park_locations SET acreage = 843.791, established = '1858-07-21' WHERE park_name = 'Yosemite National Park';
UPDATE public_parks SET park_location='Central Park' WHERE park_id=1;
UPDATE park_amenities SET amenity_description='Large picnic area with BBQ pits' WHERE amenity_name='Picnic Area';
UPDATE public_parks SET park_name = 'Central Park', park_area = 843.79 WHERE park_id = 1;
UPDATE park_amenities SET amenity_description = 'Picnic area, playground, hiking trails', amenity_name = 'Family Fun Zone' WHERE park_id = 1 AND amenity_id = 3;
UPDATE public_parks SET location = 'Central Park' WHERE park_id = 1;
UPDATE visitor_statistics SET visits = 50, visitor_type = 'Regular' WHERE visitor_id = 2;
UPDATE public_parks SET park_name = 'Central Park', location = 'New York' WHERE park_id = 1;
UPDATE visitor_statistics SET visits = 100, visitor_type = 'Regular Visitor' WHERE visitor_id = 1;
UPDATE public_parks SET location = 'Central Park' WHERE park_name = 'Central Park';
UPDATE visitor_statistics SET visitor_count = 500 WHERE park_id = '9cc73d05-8d49-4fcf-9521-0bc87a1e7e9a';
UPDATE public_parks SET location = 'Central Park, New York' WHERE park_name = 'Central Park';
UPDATE park_amenities SET category = 'Recreational' WHERE amenity_name = 'Playground' AND park_id = (SELECT id FROM public_parks WHERE park_name = 'Central Park');
UPDATE parks SET location = 'New Location', area_acres = 150 WHERE park_id = 1;
UPDATE amenities SET description = 'Updated Description' WHERE amenity_id = 2;
UPDATE parks SET location='Central Park' WHERE park_id=1
UPDATE amenities SET description='Outdoor seating area with beautiful views' WHERE amenity_id=3
